content: SOAR Jim Rogers Event Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 15 Sep 2019Is BREXIT an opportunity to invest in the UK?Would you invest in the UK now (and if yes, what would you invest in) - or would you keep away?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Cedric Jamie Soh, Director at Seniorcare.com.sgTop Contributor (Sep)Level 7. Grand MasterAnswered on 16 Sep 2019Uncertainty. I won't invest till more clouds clear. The reason is I don't have a big stomach and big capital to withstand big see-saw for this case.The uncertainty is huge... No one knows what is going on, not even the brits.Brexit with a deal?Brexit with no deal?What are the customs, the borders going to be like? What are the recuperations gonna be for the local economy? (Forgive me if I am wrong, doesn't seem like the local politicians care abt the ordinary brits than their own political careers)Too much uncertainty to put in new investments. Definitely not in property. Not in stocks.0 comments1
